title: Every site needs a Links Page / Why linking matters
excerpts: Links are the lifeblood of the web, and linking to other sites is a declaration of independence.
I am the infrastructure of the web, I am not content, not am I a product, I am a human and a participant in this great work of humanity we call the Internet.
comment: be a positive citizen of the web!

title: Normalise, don't share
excerpts: It is up to you whether you share yourself or not. But whatever you choose to do, whether you share scrappy fiddles or not, you **must** *normalise* sharing scrappy fiddles, at the very least for those who want to or have no choice, like me.
comment: i love a scrappy fiddle and i'm a big fan of lu's writing
